Hamilton Avenue (right), west from Stuyvesant 'lace. In the center background is Curtis igh 5chool, at St. Marks Place; on the right is the astleton Park Apartments. The house in the foreground is the Stursbepg house, at the S. V. corner of ' amilton Avenue and Stuyvesant -lace.
